PerformanceRealization.$t: %i% got shot down trying to open up to %r%
%i% got shot down trying to open up to %r%
%i% really opened up to %r% and %prons(r,he/she)% %pron(r,was/were)% totally supportive
%ip% past got in the way of opening up to %r%
%i% trusted %r% enough to open up to %pron(r,him/her)%
%i% got all mushy with %r% even though %prons(i,he/she)% %pron(i,was/were)% already dating %o%
%i% got shut down by %r% after flirting with %o%
%i% opened up to %r% and strengthened %list(i,r,our/their)% friendship
%i% got shot down for past trangressions with %r%
%list(i,r,and)% had like a forbidden love thing going but %rs% refused to cheat on %o%

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %r%, I feel like I can really trust you. You're someone special. I want to be honest with you and share all my feelings about life and stuff. Maybe we can get together and talk sometime?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Yeah, okay. :) I think you're special too.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %r%, I feel like I can really trust you. You're someone special. I want to be honest with you and share all my feelings about life and stuff.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: %random(That sounds really lame.,Ugh. You sound like a bad reality TV episode.,How about we save all the touchy feely stuff for some who does a better impression of caring?)%

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: ...sorry for bothering you.
%r%, I feel like I can really trust you. You're someone special. I want to be honest with you and share all my feelings about life and stuff.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Woah, slow down a minute there, %gender(i,Lothario,Stella)%. This is all moving way too fast for me. And kind of in the wrong direction, actually.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: You mean...?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Yeah. TMI, %sweetie%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %r%, I feel like I can really trust you. You're someone special. I want to be honest with you and share all my feelings about life and stuff.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: %shocked%, %i%, that's sooo amazing! You can totally tell me anything! You know I'll always be there for you.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Thanks, %r%. You're the best.
%r%, I feel like I can really trust you. You're someone special. I want to be honest with you and share all my feelings about life and stuff.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Uh, I don't know, %i%. After that time when %toc1% I'm not sure I'm ready for all this touchy-feely-ness.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I'm hurt, %r%. I'm hurt that you would judge me based on those vicious lies. And/or truths.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: What goes around, comes around. Now why don't you go around over that way.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %r%... I really feel like I can trust you. I... I like you a lot, and I want us to be able to share our feelings and talk about anything without having to worry about what the other person will think.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: That's sweet, %i%. Of course you know you can tell me anything. And I promise never to judge you.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: You're the best, %r%.
%r%, I feel like I can really trust you. You're someone special. I want to be honest with you and share all my feelings about life and stuff.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Uh, shouldn't you be telling your %gender(o,boy,girl)%friend about this?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %o% can't always be there for me, %sweetie%. But you... you're here right now.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: You're disgusting.

Instantiation.name: OpenUp - Just Flirted with someone else Reject

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Baby, you're the light of my life. I want us to be completely open with each other, show our true feelings, bare our souls.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Oh, %sweetie%! That's such a good idea.
But wouldn't you rather be doing that with %o%?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Uh..... what?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Oh, don't play dumb, %pejorative%. I saw you flirting with %pron(o,him/her)% just now. Do you think I'm an idiot or something?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Baby, %pron(o,he/she)% meant nothing to me! You're the only one who matters!

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Tell it to the hand, jerk.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %r%, I feel like we're good friends and I can trust you with anything.  You always seem to have my back.
I want you by my side.  A confidant! A wingman%gender(r,, or wingperson or whatever )%for life!

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: %i%, I feel the same way.  I'll always have your back.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: World, HERE WE COME!

Instantiation.name: OpenUp - Recently Negative SFDB to Responder Reject

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %r%, I feel like I can really trust you.  You're someone special.  I want to be honest and share all of my feelings with you.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: You should have shared your feelings before %toc1%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: You know I didn't mean it.  Can't we talk about this?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: *sigh*... Give me some time, and we can begin anew.  For now, give me some space.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %r%, I feel the time has come to be honest with you.

I... I'm in love with you, %r%. I think about you %random(every day,all the time,constantly,from first period through seventh period,from morning till night)%. You're the most important thing in the world to me.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: %i%! What are you saying? Don't you know I'm dating %o%?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I don't care about %gender(o,him,her)%. All I want is to be with you. And I couldn't hide that from you any more.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Oh, %sweetie%... you're so sweet and kind... I... I feel the same way about you.
What are we going to do?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: You have to break it off with %o%, %r%. For me.
For us.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I... I'll think about it.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %r%, I feel the time has come to be honest with you.

I... I'm in love with you, %r%. I think about you %random(every day,all the time,constantly,from first period through seventh period,from morning till night)%. You're the most important thing in the world to me.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: %i%! What are you saying? Don't you know I'm dating %o%?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I don't care about %gender(o,him,her)%. All I want is to be with you. And I couldn't hide that from you any more.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Oh, %sweetie%... you're so sweet and kind... I... I feel the same way about you.
But... I could never cheat on %o%. And it's wrong of you to act this way towards me while %gender(o,he,she)% and I are still dating.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: But %sweetie%...

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: No, %i%, I'm sorry. It... it wasn't meant to be.
